Package design.aeonic.nifty.api.recipe.ingredient

Interface IngredientValue<T>

All Superinterfaces:
Predicate<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ItemIngredientValue
All Known Implementing Classes:
FluidEmptyValue, FluidMultiStackValue, FluidStackValue, FluidTagValue, ItemEmptyValue, ItemMultiStackValue, ItemStackValue, ItemTagValue, ItemVanillaValue
public interface IngredientValue<T> extends Predicate<T>
The inner part of a ModularIngredient, analogous to the Vanilla Ingredient.Value. Essentially an ingredient predicate that disregards required amounts.
